law.catch_line: Appeal of board's final order relating to lay-off of continuing status employee.

text.section: A final order of the board either upholding or invalidating the lay-off of a continuing status employee may be appealed either by the employee or by the appointing authority.
The party aggrieved may appeal that order by filing a petition with the clerk of the Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and renumbered 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 21, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 44, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 475, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1994.
